title: I am the Lucky Cat of an MMORPG - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Romance   Sci-fi   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Doting Love Interests   Futuristic Setting   Gamers   Handsome Male Lead   Healers   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Lucky Protagonist   MMORPG   Past Trauma   Pets   Virtual Reality   Wealthy Characters
author: Black Wings   黑色的羽翼
description:
Bai XiaoYu, a student who had become an otaku due to being forced into living a life of seclusion after a tragic event in real life, met a magical lucky pet cat when he took to secluding himself in a game.

Not only did the cat beckon fortune, it also beckoned a sugar daddy and enemies.

Can it beckon ultimate happiness?>
